participant_1.background:
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.
My parents are supportive of my musical career and help me out a lot.
I do my laundry when I run out of clean clothes.
I work in a coffee shop, and I can get a little stressed out with the fast pace and the need to always be on my feet.
I am more of an introvert and would rather spend my time reading or watching Ted Talks than scrolling through social media.

i like katy perry as a musician.

story i ve ever heard.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook and travel. I watch horror movies to relax. What about you?

I am more of an introvert and would rather spend my time reading or watching Ted Talks than scrolling through social media. I also work as a wedding planner, but I'm not sure if it's my perfect career.
That's cool! I am the only person in my family, so I am used to being alone. I love to travel and cook, but I'm not sure if I would like to be a wedding planner.
Why not? I think it would be a fun job to meet new people and help them plan their special day.
I don't know. I think I would be too stressed out with all the details. I would rather just relax and enjoy the day.
I can see how that would be stressful. But it could also be really rewarding to see your clients happy on their wedding day.
Yeah, I guess you're right. I might have to give it a try sometime.
I think you should! It might be the perfect job for you.
Thanks for the advice! I'll keep it in mind.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
